title: Hello! I am Simon, a frontend web developer from Bristol in the UK. I *heart* Drupal, React and Gatsby.
description: I am passionate about frontend technologies, have over seventeen years commercial experience, I'm hard working, a team player, and like being social. I am an advocate of web standards, web accessibility and open-source software. Interested in usability to create an intuitive experience, strive to follow best practices, and form an inclusive web.
